# Project Vortex
> A high-throughput Financial Assets ETL Engine and analytics backend.

## Core Files
- [backend/api/main.py]: Main entry of FastAPI application
- [backend/etl/main.py]: Base of the ETL pipeline
- [docs/README.md]: Root of all documentation

## Key Concepts
- **ETL Architecture**: Uses Extractors for external API (Binance, CoinGecko), Transformers for data processing/technical analysis, Loaders for persisting in InfluxDB or Redis.
- **Factory Pattern**: The system dynamically loads strategies, extractors and transformers using Python `importlib`.
- **Trading Engine**: A multi-tiered structure from Data Foundation to Strategy and Execution handles quantitative strategies.

## Docs
- Read `docs/product-definitions.md` for goal hierarchy.
- Read `docs/engineering-guidelines.md` for structural guidelines.
- Read `docs/plans/` for implementation goals.
